## With Typeform, you can â€¨customize everything

### Branding

Change text, colors, and even logos to match the look and feel of your brand. Then embed forms smoothly onto web and email.

### Experience

Make forms feel effortless to fill out. Pace questions, call people by their name, and adapt the flow based on the data they share.

### Integrations

Stay efficient by connecting forms to your workflow. Typeform integrates with 300+ tools including Slack, Zapier, and HubSpot.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffe2174aa8e8d5661c2708/671a8121cfab40f53733710e_3e2ca1b7c4134bff047e46aaab0c9d28_b2c%20branding.webp)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffe2174aa8e8d5661c2708/67336e5417e4a4b719d407b5_typeform-logic-jumps-desktop.webp)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffe2174aa8e8d5661c2708/67336e61745666127d192f81_typeform-integrations.webp)

Product feedback survey templateÂ FAQs:

### What should I include in my product feedback survey?

The key to collecting actionable feedback? Always ask a range of questions.

In our flexible form builder, there are plenty of question types to choose from. Rankings and ratings get you quantitative data thatâ€™s quick to compare. Long Text questions are great for gathering in-depth product insights. And Picture Choice questions help keep users engaged, while keeping drop-off rates low.

A great product feedback survey is a delicate balancing act. It asks just the right amount of questions, so you get all the data you need without overwhelming respondents.

Not sure where to start? Use our pre-made survey template as a baseâ€”itâ€™s free to use and a breeze to customize.

### Why should I use Typeform to conduct product research?

With a Typeform survey, itâ€™s easier than ever to collect actionable feedback. In fact, 87% of new users reported deeper insights after switching to Typeform. Not bad, right?

This is because our surveys are built for humans, by humans. We ask one question at a timeâ€”just like a real conversationâ€”meaning respondents arenâ€™t distracted by whatâ€™s coming next. Instead, they can give their full attention to one question. And unsurprisingly, this often leads to more thoughtful answers.

With Typeform, itâ€™s not just easy to collect feedback. Itâ€™s easy to organize it, too.

Our suite of integrations automates your manual tasks: Google Sheets turns responses into spreadsheets and graphs, so itâ€™s easier to draw conclusions and take action. Our Slack integration pings the right people when anyone submits a survey. And integrations with your go-to project management tool help create and assign tasks automatically.

primary.reasoning: Button #1 ('Start with this template') has a dark background color (#2A222B) with vibrant text color (#FAF9FB), making it stand out as the primary CTA. It uses action-oriented text that encourages users to engage with the template.

secondary.reasoning: Button #0 ('Preview template') has a light background color (#FAF9FB) which is different from the primary button's dark color. It is less prominent and serves as a secondary action, allowing users to preview the template without committing to starting with it.

personality.targetAudience: business professionals and teams looking for feedback solutions

survey_basics.title: Product Feedback Survey Template
survey_basics.purpose: Use insights you get from this survey to fuel product growth
survey_basics.use_case: Collect feedback on products to improve offerings
survey_basics.description: A survey template designed to gather feedback from users about products.

sections.section_description: Introduction to the survey and its purpose.
Questions aimed at gathering user feedback on products.
Thanking participants and providing next steps.

ux_best_practices.description: Avoid overwhelming users with too many questions at once.
ux_best_practices.implementation: Ask one question at a time.

ux_best_practices.description: Incorporate images or videos to make the survey more appealing.
